summary: AN ORDINANCE granting King County permission to construct, maintain and operate an underground pedestrian tunnel under and across 5th Avenue, south of Jefferson Street, and for an underground pedestrian concourse across the alleyway south of Jefferson Street between 5th and 6th Avenues; for a ten (10) year term, renewable for two successive ten year terms, specifying the conditions under which this permit is granted, and providing for acceptance of the permit conditions.
